name: supply-chain-blockchain
description: Blockchain Supply Chain Application for Agricultural Produce Tracking

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:contracts" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.build: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:api && npm run build:web
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:api && npm run test:web
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd packages/contracts && npm install && cd ../api-gateway && npm install && cd ../web-dashboard && npm install && cd ../mobile-app && npm install && cd ../qr-service && npm install

author: Blockchain Supply Chain Team
